articles.author: Sara Barnes
articles.title: Miss England Finalist Embraces a Fresh Face With No Makeup - My Modern Met
articles.description: “Our flaws make us who we are and that's what makes every individual unique.”
articles.content: There's an assumption that beauty pageant contestants must wear a full face of makeup in order to compete. And while that’s certainly still the norm, one woman is embracing her natural looks and havi… [+2729 chars]
